Name: Coin Crypt
About the game: A roguelite deckbuilding adventure game about magical coins. You play as a lootmancer , who can unlock the hidden power inside of coins and use them in magical duels. The loots you take from chests and enemies also become your next moves, so plan carefully! Features Roguelike structure: randomly generated levels and permanent death! 19 unlockable character classes with unique gameplay! One of those classes is a monkey! (!!!!!) Constant, delicious tension: you always need to spend coins to get more coins A grandma that packs a whollop! SECRETS! (duh)
Meta Title: Coin Crypt: Oct 28, 2014, Greg Lobanov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Coin Crypt? Check out the release date (Oct 28, 2014), developer insights from Greg Lobanov, and a complete game summary.
